text: Monroe Gunn McKay (May 30, 1928 â€“ March 28, 2020) was an American politician and judge. He was a Senior United States Circuit Judge of the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit. He was nominated by President Jimmy Carter in 1977. He retired in 1993 where he became senior judge. McKay was born in Huntsville, Utah. McKay died on March 28, 2020 in Orem, Utah at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== *Deseret News *Environmental Case *NY Times Education Article *Ruling Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Utah Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Monroe G. McKay
